original_title: 生きている人間旅行「ごぜ・盲目の女旅芸人」
overview: "Goze" drawn by painter Shinichi Saito. One of the few remaining blind women in the snowy Niigata region, a traveling entertainer who played the shamisen and sang, visited villages and left a record of living on the mercy of others.
title: 生きている人間旅行「ごぜ・盲目の女旅芸人」
